import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import './Login.css'; import logo from '../../Resorces/logo_RLAB.png' import { userContext } from '../../App'; const Login = () => { const [click, setClick] = useState({ login: true, signUp: false }) const handleSignUp = () => { const newClick = {...click} newClick.login = false; newClick.signUp = true; setClick(newClick) } const handleLogin = () => { const newClick = {...click} newClick.login = true; newClick.signUp = false; setClick(newClick) }; const [user, setUser] = useContext(userContext); const handleOnChange = (e) => { const newUserInfo = {...user} newUserInfo[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setUser(newUserInfo); console.log(user.ConfirmPassword); } return (
{click.login &&

); }; export default Login;
